name: Revelry
wikiSummary: "Revelry" is the third single from Kings of Leon's fourth studio album Only by the Night, released on March 2, 2009, with a music video, allegedly about a "motorcycle gang", and the band playing in the background. The single debuted in the UK Singles Chart at #55 via download sales alone on March 1, 2009, and peaked at #29 the following week. It dropped only two places to #31 during its second physical week. It has marked the band's ninth UK Top 40 single.
wikiText:
"Revelry" is the third single from Kings of Leon's fourth studio album Only by the Night, released on March 2, 2009, with a music video, allegedly about a "motorcycle gang", and the band playing in the background. The single debuted in the UK Singles Chart at #55 via download sales alone on March 1, 2009, and peaked at #29 the following week. It dropped only two places to #31 during its second physical week. It has marked the band's ninth UK Top 40 single.
